preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 80 g of niobium (Nb) and place it in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 2. Add 160 g of nickel (Ni) to the container. 
 3. Add 40 g of selenium (Se) and 40 g of tellurium (Te) to the mixture. 
 4. Use a mechanical stirrer to mix the powders thoroughly until a uniform blend is achieved, approximately 10-15 minutes.
